name: Mech vs. Bugs
description:
In Mech vs Bugs, your role as a solo mech pilot will see you defending against relentless alien invasions on remote planets. This game is an exciting merge of top-down, third-person action reminiscent of titles like Vampire Survivors and Brotato. Brimming with intense battles, strategic loot collection, and in-depth crafting, you'll continuously improve your mech to combat waves of insectoid foes. With each planet you liberate, the stakes increase in this thrilling journey from one alien world to the next.

Mech vs Bugs places you at the helm of an advanced mechanized unit, the last line of defense against an alien invasion. As a solo pilot, you will traverse various planets, combating swarms of insectoid enemies in adrenaline-fueled, close-quarter combat scenarios.

The game's third-person top-down perspective puts you right in the center of the action. Insectoid enemies will relentlessly rush you in melee waves, each one tougher than the last. With your piloting skills and strategic mindset, you'll maneuver your mech, hold your ground, and collect precious loot from your defeated enemies.

Beyond the battlefield, engage with the game's comprehensive market and crafting systems. Use your loot to trade on the market, negotiate for valuable goods, and purchase upgrades for your mech. Craft advanced weapons and shields from your resources, reinforcing your mech to face the next wave of alien onslaught.

As you liberate each planet from the insectoid menace, the challenges grow fiercer, the alien hordes more intense. Adapt and thrive or fall under the alien wave. Your mech stands as the only barrier between these invaders and total galactic domination.

Key Features


Frenzied Solo Mech Combat: Hold back hordes of melee-rushing insectoid aliens with your high-tech mech. Experience the thrill of top-down bullet heaven gameplay.

Strategic Looting and Trading: Gather valuable loot from defeated enemies. Trade at the market, and utilize your resources to bolster your mech's defenses.

In-depth Crafting System: Combine your loot and purchased goods to craft potent mech upgrades, enhancing your combat performance against the ever-escalating alien threat.

Dynamic Progression: Every liberated planet increases the intensity of your battles, pushing your skills and strategy to the limit.

Immersive Visuals: Delve into stunning, Unreal Engine-powered alien landscapes that set the stage for your epic defense of the galaxy.

In Mech vs Bugs, fast-paced mech combat, tactical gameplay, and a deep progression system combine to create an electrifying gaming experience. Can you withstand the insectoid onslaught and save the galaxy?
